title: Hi-Fi Rendezvous
original_name: ハイ・ファイ・ランデブー
sinopse:
Childhood friends Tsutsuji and Kouji live in a tiny village. Due to the lack of students, their school's scheduled to be closed at the end of the year; they'll be its final batch. The two of them have always been together, but at this rate they may be separated after graduation...

(Source: Taiyo Tosho, translated)
